name: Tax
description: Comprehensive tax definition and configuration catalog supporting multiple jurisdictions, calculation methods, and complex tax scenarios. Defines tax types, rates, calculation methods, jurisdictions, exemptions, and special handling rules. Reference data used by TaxEntry for actual tax calculations on documents.

properties.name: code
properties.description: Unique tax code identifier (e.g., VAT-STD-20, NY-SALES-8.875)

properties.name: name
properties.description: Display name of the tax

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of the tax, when it applies, and any special conditions
properties.example: Standard VAT rate applicable to most goods and services in France

properties.name: taxType
properties.description: Category of tax - determines the nature and regulatory framework of the tax

properties.name: taxScope
properties.description: Scope of what the tax applies to - restricts tax to specific types of products or services

properties.name: rate
properties.description: Tax rate as percentage (e.g., 20 for 20%) or absolute amount based on calculationMethod

properties.name: calculationMethod
properties.description: Method used to calculate the tax. percentage: standard percentage calculation. fixed_amount: flat fee regardless of amount. tiered: different rates for different amount ranges. progressive: rate increases with amount. compound: calculated on top of other taxes (tax on tax). percentage_tax_included: tax is extracted from price that already includes tax (division method)

properties.name: isCompound
properties.description: Whether this tax is calculated on top of other taxes (compound tax, e.g., Quebec PST on GST)

properties.name: compoundSequence
properties.description: Order in which to apply this tax when multiple taxes exist. Lower numbers applied first. Used for compound tax calculations

properties.name: baseForCompound
properties.description: List of tax codes that should be included in the base amount for compound calculation

properties.name: includeBaseAmount
properties.description: If true, this tax affects the base of subsequent taxes with higher sequence (Odoo pattern)

properties.name: isBaseAffected
properties.description: If true, taxes with lower sequence can affect this tax's base amount

properties.name: priceIncludesTax
properties.description: Whether the price already includes this tax (tax-inclusive pricing). When true, tax is extracted from price rather than added to it

properties.name: jurisdiction
properties.description: Geographic jurisdiction code (ISO country code, state/province code, or municipality code)

properties.name: jurisdictionLevel
properties.description: Level of jurisdiction hierarchy

properties.name: jurisdictionName
properties.description: Human-readable name of the jurisdiction

properties.name: postalCodeFrom
properties.description: Starting postal/ZIP code for location-based tax (inclusive). Used for granular jurisdiction matching

properties.name: postalCodeTo
properties.description: Ending postal/ZIP code for location-based tax (inclusive). If same as postalCodeFrom, applies to single postal code

properties.name: addressType
properties.description: Which address to use for determining tax jurisdiction. billing: customer billing address. shipping: delivery destination. origin: seller/warehouse location

properties.name: isActive
properties.description: Whether this tax is currently active and should be applied to new transactions

properties.name: effectiveFrom
properties.description: Date from which this tax rate is effective (inclusive)

properties.name: effectiveUntil
properties.description: Date until which this tax rate is valid (inclusive). Null if indefinite

properties.name: applicableToProducts
properties.description: Whether this tax applies to physical products/goods

properties.name: applicableToServices
properties.description: Whether this tax applies to services

properties.name: applicableToShipping
properties.description: Whether this tax applies to shipping/freight charges

properties.name: applicableToHandling
properties.description: Whether this tax applies to handling fees

properties.name: applicableToDiscounts
properties.description: Whether this tax should be calculated after discounts are applied

properties.name: taxClass
properties.description: Tax class identifier for grouping similar tax rates (e.g., 'standard', 'reduced', 'zero', 'exempt'). Used in Magento/WooCommerce patterns

properties.name: taxGroup
properties.description: Tax group identifier for combining multiple taxes that appear together (e.g., 'EU VAT', 'US Sales Tax')

properties.name: priority
properties.description: Priority for tax calculation and application order. Lower numbers have higher priority. Used for determining which tax applies when multiple rates match

properties.name: displayOrder
properties.description: Order in which to display this tax on documents (invoices, receipts)

properties.name: minimumAmount
properties.description: Minimum transaction amount for tax to apply. Tax only applies if transaction total meets or exceeds this threshold

properties.name: maximumAmount
properties.description: Maximum tax amount cap. Tax calculation is capped at this value regardless of transaction amount

properties.name: minimumTaxableAmount
properties.description: Minimum amount that must be taxable for this tax to apply (different from minimumAmount which is transaction total)

properties.name: exemptionThreshold
properties.description: Amount below which transactions are exempt from this tax (small seller exemption, de minimis threshold)

properties.name: isReverseCharge
properties.description: Whether this tax uses reverse charge mechanism (EU VAT pattern). When true, buyer is responsible for tax payment instead of seller

properties.name: reverseChargeConditions
properties.description: Conditions under which reverse charge applies (e.g., 'B2B intra-community supply', 'Construction services')

properties.name: isIntraCommunity
properties.description: Whether this is an intra-community (EU cross-border) tax rate. Applies to supplies between EU member states

properties.name: zeroRatedReason
properties.description: Reason for zero rate or exemption. Important for compliance and audit trails

properties.name: exemptionCertificateRequired
properties.description: Whether a tax exemption certificate must be provided to apply this tax rate (US pattern for resale certificates)

properties.name: vatRegistrationRequired
properties.description: Whether customer must have a valid VAT registration number for this rate to apply

properties.name: roundingMethod
properties.description: Method for rounding tax amounts. round_per_line: round each line item tax. round_total: round total tax only

properties.name: roundingPrecision
properties.description: Number of decimal places for rounding (e.g., 2 for currency precision, 4 for high-precision)

properties.name: roundAtSubtotal
properties.description: Whether to round tax at subtotal level rather than per line item (WooCommerce pattern)

properties.name: taxExigibility
properties.description: When the tax becomes due. on_invoice: due when invoice is issued. on_payment: due when payment is received (cash basis). on_delivery: due when goods are delivered

properties.name: cashBasisAccount
properties.description: Account code for cash basis transition account (Odoo pattern). Used to track tax amounts pending payment

properties.name: taxableItemCategories
properties.description: List of product/item categories this tax applies to. Empty array means applies to all categories

properties.name: exemptItemCategories
properties.description: List of product/item categories exempt from this tax

properties.name: applicableCustomerTypes
properties.description: Types of customers this tax applies to (Odoo customer tax class pattern)

properties.name: isWithholding
properties.description: Whether this is a withholding tax (tax withheld at source, common in many jurisdictions for payments to contractors/services)

properties.name: withholdingType
properties.description: Type of withholding tax if isWithholding is true

properties.name: withholdingThreshold
properties.description: Annual threshold above which withholding tax applies (ERPNext pattern)

properties.name: childTaxes
properties.description: Array of tax codes that are part of this tax group. Used for composite taxes that combine multiple individual taxes (Odoo group tax pattern)

properties.name: replacedByTaxCode
properties.description: Code of tax that replaces this one (for historical/archived taxes). Used for fiscal position mapping

properties.name: originalTaxCodes
properties.description: List of domestic tax codes this tax can replace based on fiscal position (Odoo alternative tax pattern)

properties.name: invoiceLabel
properties.description: Label to display on invoices (may differ from name for customer-facing documents)

properties.name: receiptLabel
properties.description: Label to display on receipts, especially point-of-sale receipts (shorter form)

properties.name: legalReference
properties.description: Legal or regulatory reference for this tax (e.g., 'Article 278 CGI', 'IRC Section 1234')

properties.name: legalNotes
properties.description: Legal mentions or notes that must be printed on invoices when this tax is applied
properties.example: Reverse charge applies - Customer must self-account for VAT

properties.name: taxAuthorityName
properties.description: Name of the tax authority that collects this tax

properties.name: taxAuthorityCode
properties.description: Official code or identifier from tax authority

properties.name: reportingCategory
properties.description: Category for tax reporting and filing (maps to tax return line items)

properties.name: accountingCode
properties.description: General ledger account code for posting this tax

properties.name: collectedTaxAccount
properties.description: Account code for tax collected from customers (sales tax)

properties.name: paidTaxAccount
properties.description: Account code for tax paid to suppliers (purchase tax, input VAT)

properties.name: tags
properties.description: Tags for categorizing and filtering taxes (e.g., 'food', 'digital', 'reduced-rate')

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: Additional jurisdiction-specific or implementation-specific metadata as JSON object

properties.name: isDeleted
properties.description: Soft delete flag. Historical tax rates should not be hard deleted but marked as deleted for audit trail

properties.name: deletedAt
properties.description: Timestamp when tax was soft deleted

properties.name: createdBy
properties.description: User ID who created this tax configuration

properties.name: modifiedBy
properties.description: User ID who last modified this tax configuration

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version number for tracking tax rate changes over time

examples.name: VAT Standard Rate
examples.description: Standard VAT rate applicable to most goods and services in France

examples.name: VAT Reduced Rate
examples.description: Reduced VAT rate for essential goods (food, books, medicine)

examples.name: VAT Intra-Community Supply
examples.description: Zero-rated VAT for B2B intra-community supply within EU
examples.reverseChargeConditions: B2B intra-community supply within EU with valid VAT number
examples.legalNotes: Reverse charge applies - Customer must self-account for VAT under Article 196 EU VAT Directive

examples.name: New York Sales Tax
examples.description: Combined state and local sales tax for New York City
examples.taxAuthorityName: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance

examples.name: Canadian GST
examples.description: Federal Goods and Services Tax in Canada

examples.name: Quebec Sales Tax
examples.description: Quebec Provincial Sales Tax (calculated on subtotal + GST)

examples.name: UK VAT Standard Rate (Price Inclusive)
examples.description: Standard UK VAT rate with tax-inclusive pricing

examples.name: Central GST
examples.description: Central Goods and Services Tax for intra-state supply in India
examples.taxAuthorityName: Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs

examples.name: State GST
examples.description: State Goods and Services Tax for intra-state supply in India

examples.name: ICMS São Paulo
examples.description: State VAT on circulation of goods and services in São Paulo
examples.taxAuthorityName: Secretaria da Fazenda do Estado de São Paulo

examples.name: Australian GST
examples.description: Goods and Services Tax in Australia

examples.name: Federal Income Tax Withholding
examples.description: Federal income tax withholding on contractor payments
